Headline: #70 Division Temporary Reroute at Division/Kilpatrick
ShortDescription: 70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Division, Cicero, Augusta, Kostner & Division, due to street blockage near Division/Kilpatrick

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Division, Cicero, Augusta, Kostner and Division, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Division/Kilpatrick. 

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains trains are running w/residual delays due to signal problems near 95th/Dan Ryan. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains trains are running w/residual delays due to signal problems near 95th/Dan Ryan. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
